README:
This package contains code implementing multiscale framework described in:
Shai Bagon and Meirav Galun, A Unified Multiscale Framework for Discrete Energy Minimization, 2012

arXiv: http://arxiv.org/abs/1204.4867

If you use this code, please use the following citation in all relevant publications:
@article{Bagon2012,
   author={Shai Bagon and Meirav Galun},
   title ={A Unified Multiscale Framework for Discrete Energy Minimization},
   journal={arXiv},
   year={2012}
}

Sub folders include
icm/ - code for Iterated Consitional Modes (Basage 1986).
discrete_multiscale/ - main functionality of package
demo/ - demo code

Installation:
1. Unpack the package into a folder
2. In Matlab, go to that folder and type
   >> installDiscreteMultiscaleOpt.m
   This script should compile all associated mex-files and add relevant folders to path.
3. run demo/discrete_multiscale_demo 
4. Use
   >> doc discreteMultiscaleOptimization
   or
   >> doc discreteMultiscaleOptimization_labels
   For more details

Please see LICENSE file for EULA.




Shai Bagon, 2012
www.wisdom.weizmann.ac.il/~bagon
description: Matlab code implementing discrete multiscale optimization presented in: Shai Bagon and Meirav Galun A Unified Multiscale Framework for Discrete Energy Minimization (arXiv'2012), and Shai Bagon and Meirav Galun A Multiscale Framework for Challenging Discrete Optimization (NIPS Workshop on Optimization for Machine Learning 2012).
